author: mbautin
msg: [jira] [HBASE-6983] [89-fb] Metric for unencoded size of cached blocks
Summary: We need to measure the amount of unencoded data in the block cache when data block encoding is enabled.
Reviewers: kannan, kranganathan, liyintang, aaiyer, mcorgan

author: mbautin
msg: [89-fb] [HBASE-5991] Use sequential znodes for reader-writer locks
This is a continuation of HBASE-5494.
Convert table level locks to sequential use ZNodes, introducing
reader-writer locks. This allows schema changes to go through during region splits or merges and reduces the complexity of exclusive locks.
Test Plan: Run unit tests, including TestDistributedReadWriteLocks

author: lu4242
msg: update page and remove sandbox module to prevent release it

author: ceposta
msg: * Added more tests around Inactivity Monitoring / MQTT keep alive
* Removed the KeepAliveInfo check from the MQTTInactivityMonitor, clarified the PINGREQ/RESP frames in the inactivity check
* Implemented a grace period for the keep alive on the server side per MQTT spec
* Added "default" keep alive for server-side control of lingering MQTT connections
